quote: Do or do not. There is no try.
author: Yoda

quote: Not all those who wander are lost.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.
author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: You can’t use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: It's kind of fun to do the impossible.
author: Walt Disney

quote: To boldly go where no one has gone before.
author: Star Trek

quote: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
author: Maya Angelou
source: I Know Why the Caged Bird Sings

quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: We are all apprentices in a craft where no one ever becomes a master.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Writing is thinking on paper.
author: William Zinsser

quote: The scariest moment is always just before you start.
author: Stephen King

quote: A writer is someone for whom writing is more difficult than it is for other people.
author: Thomas Mann

quote: If you don't see the book you want on the shelf, write it.
author: Beverly Cleary

quote: Stories make us more alive, more human, more courageous, more loving.
author: Madeleine L'Engle

quote: The universe is made of stories, not atoms.
author: Muriel Rukeyser

quote: You must stay drunk on writing so reality cannot destroy you.
author: Ray Bradbury
source: Zen in the Art of Writing

quote: Don't panic.
author: Douglas Adams
source: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

quote: Reality is frequently inaccurate.
author: Douglas Adams
source: The Restaurant at the End of the Universe

quote: There is no friend as loyal as a book.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Fantasy is hardly an escape from reality. It's a way of understanding it.
author: Lloyd Alexander

quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
author: Alan Kay

quote: Imagination will often carry us to worlds that never were. But without it we go nowhere.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: A book is a dream that you hold in your hand.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: Fairy tales are more than true — not because they tell us dragons exist, but because they tell us dragons can be beaten.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: You can make anything by writing.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The difference between fiction and reality? Fiction has to make sense.
author: Tom Clancy

quote: Words are, in my not-so-humble opinion, our most inexhaustible source of magic.
author: J.K. Rowling
source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: Reading is essential for those who seek to rise above the ordinary.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: A room without books is like a body without a soul.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Eliot

quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act but a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: If you want to fly, you have to give up the things that weigh you down.
author: Toni Morrison

quote: We are all stories in the end. Just make it a good one.
author: Doctor Who

quote: Don't tell me the moon is shining; show me the glint of light on broken glass.
author: Anton Chekhov

quote: The only thing you absolutely have to know is the location of the library.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Fill your paper with the breathings of your heart.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: You don’t write because you want to say something, you write because you have something to say.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
author: Maya Angelou
source: I Know Why the Caged Bird Sings

quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
